abilities.name: Green Breath
abilities.text: When you attach a Grass Energy card from your hand to Sceptile, remove 2 damage counters from Sceptile.

attacks.name: Leaf Blast
attacks.text: Does 20 damage times the amount of Grass Energy attached to Sceptile.

attacks.name: Poison Claws
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
